Once in the activation site the three will blend the energies of their astral bodies in one unit of ultra- conscious energy identity. The physical and astral bodies of the Flame Holders serve as a conduit through which the electronically stored data from the Hall of Records can download, activate the portals and pass into the Sphere of Amenti. The Flame Holders allow the Hall of Records to be put “on line” with the Sphere of Amenti, after which time this data trans- mits through Earth’s grid and becomes available to anyone on Earth who can translate the information.
